column5: This online haematology programme boosts your understanding of blood management and haematology patient management for progression to senior positions.Our Biomed Online modules are aimed at health sector employees who want to keep their knowledge up to date with the latest developments in biomedical science and related subjects. The haematology programme provides specialist knowledge of current practice in normal and pathological blood management and blood transfusion and haematology patient management.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
